pageContext.claim: “The Fake News Washington Post, and even more Fake News New York Times, are writing stories that there is infighting with respect to my strong policy in the Middle East. There is no infighting whatsoever. Different opinions are expressed and I make a decisive and final decision - it is a very simple process. All sides, views, and policies are covered. I'm sure that Iran will want to talk soon.”
pageContext.analysis: The articles were based on extensive interviews with senior administration officials. This is another example of how Trump calls unflattering news articles "fake news."
